alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 3:36PM MDT until May 12 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek At Colorado Springs affecting El Paso County. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek At Colorado Springs. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS... ...At 9.5 feet, Action Stage. Water flows over the Front Range Trail under the South Nevada Bridge. Homeless community encampment may be affected. ...At 11.5 feet, Flood Stage. The river is bankfull. Homeless encampments along creek are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 8.7 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall to 8.1 feet late this afternoon. It will rise to flood stage. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.7 feet on 04/30/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Homeless communities should be alert to swift, cold water and rapid rises on Fountain Creek in the vicinity of the South Nevada Ave Bridge. The Front Range Trail and other low-lying areas can be inundated even at creek levels below flood stage. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM MDT.
